term.title: paramagnetic

item.text: Substances having a magnetic susceptibility greater than 0 are paramagnetic. They are drawn into a magnetic field.

sources.item: PAC, 1994, 66, 1077. 'Glossary of terms used in physical organic chemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1994)' on page 1149 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199466051077)
